pr_title: Ignore specified contigs for pre-aligned BAMs in PathSeq

timeline.bodyText: I'd like for the error to specify somehow is that the problem is the contigs specified for filtering.  Otherwise users will be validating all their input files and scratching their heads.
timeline.author: ldgauthier

timeline.bodyText: Is it really called chrEBV?  Honestly I haven't looked at all 3500 names.
timeline.author: ldgauthier
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -190,6 +193,16 @@
             optional = true)
     public int minIdentity = 30;
 
+    /**
+     * If using --is-host-aligned, ignores alignments to these contigs (can be specified multiple times). This
+     * can be useful if the alignment is to a reference containing a microbe, such as chrEBV in hg38.

replies.bodyText: Yep. I recently found out it's also in hg19 but it uses the NCBI accession
